column4: Hi, is there a way to check if my floppy disk is working or not? I have the FDD in the case, I have a floppy disk inserted. The PC is a server so doe snot have a monitor, mouse or keyboard attached also no GUI. I am connected over SSH.
there sould be something like /dev/fd0 I suppose
try mounting it to some path
there is no /dev/fd0, so I suppose the cables in within the PC case are not connected. is that possible?
